item.title: Incident Response Lifecycle
item.description: Is made up of the major steps taken in intrusion detection and response with the goal to be agnostic to type of attack, it means that the cycle can be adapted to any scenario. Preparation Before trying to understand the adversary is necessary to organizations to understand themselves, with this we can assess if we are giving the opportunity to the adversary and help understand if we fall in the intentions or objectives of this adversaries

item.title: Threat Intelligence Lifecycle
item.description: If we skip entire processes of the cycle, we can be at risk of having more questions and useless information. We need to identify and recognize the importance of each process, beginning with: Direction, where the requirements and questions are established to be solved by the intelligence analysts. Collection, where the data necessary to answer the requirements and questions is gathered. Always document the source where the data is collected. Also this a process, so you can have rounds of collection.
